tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_111: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.',verse: 6086,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.',verse: 6087,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame',verse: 6088,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'And his wife [as well] -  the carrier of firewood.',verse: 6089,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.',verse: 6090,},name: surah_111,};
